description: I can't set up an account - evidently zoho.com is not a "valid" email (no, I'm *not* changing email just to use an app)
Have used this app for some time, but suddenly nothing that I wrote got saved any more and now I can't even open up the app. Also it is really slow.

i stumble upon this app by chance, it was the first notes app y came across in ubuntu when i started using it, after a few weeks i tried new notes app given the fact i had to re-install my OS and lost the apps i had, not a single notes app was as confortable and user friendly as this one
